block_comment: The given block of code controls a debug access signal in a synchronous digital system. Upon detection of a rising edge of the clock signal, or a falling edge of the reset signal `jrst_n`, the block manages the value of the `debugaccess` signal. More specifically, it resets `debugaccess` to 0 when `jrst_n` is 0 (representing a reset condition), otherwise it lets `debugaccess` latch the value of `debugaccess_nxt` on a rising clock edge, thus facilitating controlled debug access.
